thread.section_title: Officewonderland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Officewonderland | officewonderland.com
thread.title: Todd Wulf

author: Todd Wulf
title: Todd Wulf
text: I was left feeling refreshed after my purchase! It's not common, in my experience, to find competant and interested customer service even for significant purchasing decisions with many vendors and companies. This experience was really a good one. My experience with OfficeWonderland was fast, professional, and top notch from start to finish. I appreciated the sales expert asking me questions to narrow the options to my needs up front, then comparing the difference efficiently and finalizing the sale and shipping within minutes. Very satisfied.
